short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a summary of your Counter-Strike match results on the game data page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since CS2 hasn't implemented a way to view your results across maps, I made this extension to view a summary of your results on your game data page. To access the page, click the button in the extension popup or copy the link at the bottom of the description. Once loaded, it will count all of your results and display a table with your wins, ties, and losses on each map.

https://steamcommunity.com/my/gcpd/730?tab=matchhistorycompetitivepermap
